Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the My Leviton skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Decora Smart WiFi devices and activities by voice. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your My Leviton account and discover your device(s). Find more information about connecting Smart Home devices at http://amzn.to/291lR7u.

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which device or activity to use. There are two ways to define this/these name(s):

* Use the name(s) you set up already – these are shown in the My Leviton app and can be changed, or

* Create an Alexa group, like nighttime or movie mode, and add the device(s) or activity(s) to the group. More information is available at http://amzn.to/2965dCE.

Once you know the name of your activities and device(s), you can say the following:

* To use an activity, you can use the 'turn on' command. For example, you can say "Turn on movie mode" or "Turn on goodnight".
